snippet: As the United States team arrived in Costa Rica for a game Friday, resentment was evident over a match in the snow in Colorado last March that prompted a protest.
abstract: United States national soccer team arrives in Costa Rica for upcoming game amid resentment over contentious World Cup qualifying game played in unforgettable snowfall; Costa Rica appealed the result to FIFA, arguing game should not have been played in such conditions, but protest was denied.
lead_paragraph: As the United States team arrived in Costa Rica for a game Friday, resentment was evident over a match in the snow in Colorado last March that prompted a protest.

headline.main: No Warm Welcome for U.S. Team in Costa Rica
headline.print_headline: No Warm Welcome for U.S. Team in Costa Rica

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
